title: Emails
content: Hello, please can you help, thunderbird is showing that I have new messages but cannot see them, this is happening on a regular basis and I have tried all the "fixes" (repair folder etc) in the help section but nothing works, looks like I may need to use another mail program. I see the new messages in the popup window when it has downloaded but do not see the new messages, just shows I have unread messages, as I use this for my business, if it happens again I will have to look for another mail program, just happening now way to often. regards Ankha
creator: ankha576

title: Problemi Thunderbird 102.11.2 con account gmail
content:
Buongiorno, utilizzo WIN10-Thunderbird 102.11.2, dal 01/06/2023 non riesco inviare posta elettronica agli account gmail.com.

Ho provato seguire il vostro tutorial Conversione automatica degli account di posta Gmail all'autenticazione OAuth 2.0 ma si presenta la situazione indicata negli allegati (OAuth 2.0 non è presente)

Resto in attesa di un Vs. gradito, sollecito aiuto

Grazie Paolo Candiago
creator: paolo35

title: Chiusura programma all'apertura di file Zip
content: Salve, come riportato nell'oggetto ogni qual volta ricevo un file rar o zip sia se provo a salvarlo che aprirlo direttamente dal programma, il programma va in crash.
creator: riccardo18

title: segítség thunderbirdben emailek fogadásának  visszaállításához
content:
Jó reggelt!

Thunderbirdben használt emailcímem (lillaeinstein@t-email.hu) napok óta nem működik.A program betölt ,de új emailek fogadása , valamiért nem lehetséges (tárhely nincs tele ).Többször indítottam újra a gépet,a programot,de semmi változás.Mintha elkezdődne a letöltés,de egy idő után kiírja,hogy a kapcsolódás túllépte a maximális várakozási időt és nem történik semmi.Sajnos több hivatalos helyen is ez az emailcímem van megadva,jó lenne,ha működésre tudnám bírni.

Üdvözlettel Szikszai Katalin
creator: szikszaikatalinemese

title: Sort emails by star and then newest date on top no longer works in Beta v.114
content: My email inbox was always sorted by star and then date, with all my starred emails first at the top followed by newest emails second at the top. I have just switched to Thunderbird Beta v114 with the unified inbox folder for all my email accounts and cannot get the inbox to sort this way. I can have the newest emails at the top without the starred emails, but as soon as I put the starred emails at the top all the other emails are sorted in reverse, that is, oldest at the top. I can get the exact opposite of the arrangement I want by putting the starred emails at the foot and then the newest emails, so the oldest emails are at the top. I cannot find any way to reproduce the sort order I always used before moving to v.114.
creator: joe105
